description: This script initializes demo seed data and enqueues a SNMP GET job for testing or demonstration purposes within the device management backend. It verifies the existence of demo tenant, user, device, and credential data, creates a new job in the database, and enqueues a task via Celery to perform SNMP GET. Additionally, it provides next steps for monitoring the job.

methods.name: Optional[dict] get_demo_context()
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves demo tenant, user, device, and credential data from the database.

methods.name: str create_demo_job(context: dict)
methods.description: Creates a new SNMP GET job in the database with the specified context.

methods.name: None enqueue_demo_job(context: dict, job_id: str)
methods.description: Enqueues the SNMP GET job via Celery with the provided context and job ID.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main execution function that orchestrates retrieving demo context, creating a job, and enqueuing the task.
